name: strongholds
description: A Foundry VTT module for managing strongholds and settlements

scripts.dev:full: npm run link && npm run dev
scripts.validate: npm run clean && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.link: [ -z "$FOUNDRY_DATA" ] && echo 'Set FOUNDRY_DATA to your Foundry Data path' && exit 1 || (mkdir -p "$FOUNDRY_DATA/Data/modules" && ln -sfn "$PWD/dist" "$FOUNDRY_DATA/Data/modules/strongholds-and-followers")
scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p releases && cd dist && zip -r ../releases/strongholds-and-followers-v$npm_package_version.zip . -x dev-reload.json && cp module.json ../releases/module.json
scripts.release: BUMP=${BUMP:-patch} && npm run validate && npm version $BUMP -m 'chore: release v%s' && git push && git push --tags && npm run deploy

author: andrewgari
